titleStmt.title: Remarks on a late discourse of William Lord Bishop of Derry; concerning the inventions of men in the worship of God. By J. Boyse
titleStmt.author: Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Eliphal Dobson, Matthew Gun, and Patrick Campbel, booksellers in Dublin,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
William Lord Bishop of Derry = William King.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
